alert.note: Alert for Imperial County Southeast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 5:12PM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Imperial County through 545 PM PDT... At 511 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gordon`s Well, or 15 miles northwest of Gadsden, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gordon`s Well and Algodones Dunes. This includes the following highways... CA Interstate 8 between mile markers 63 and 90. CA Route 98 between mile markers 55 and 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
